Distressed Sion relieved, or, The garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness wherein are discovered the grand causes of the churches trouble and misery under the late dismal dispensation : with a compleat history of, and lamentation for those renowned worthies that fell in England by popish rage and cruelty, from the year 1680 to 1688 ... / by Benjamin Keach ... Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.
[14], 154 p. : ill.
Printed for Nath. Crouch ..., London : 1689.
In verse. "Licensed and entred according to order" Tightly bound. Pages 1-25 photographed from Yale University Library copy and inserted at end. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
